content: That's a great idea! Incorporating more protein into your breakfast can definitely help you stay full until lunchtime. Since you're already waking up at 6:45 AM on Tuesdays and Thursdays for your yoga class, you might consider preparing a protein-rich breakfast on those days to help fuel your morning. This could be something as simple as scrambled eggs with whole-grain toast, Greek yogurt with nuts, or a protein smoothie with banana and spinach.
